modalContent: Confident communicator, able to clearly articulate ideas and information with colleagues and clients during meetings, projects and discussions.
Adapt at designing and building eye-catching, user- friendly UI with ReactJs, Bootstrap, Tailwind, NextJS, Adobe Photoshop and React Native.
Practical Cybersecurity skills and knowledge of fundamentals including encryption, Cybersecurity layering, vulnerability management, CIA, authentication, and authorization.
Creative thinker, able to apply logic and ideas to solve real world problems. I excel and enjoy activities such as video games, board games (chess) and Codwars.
Able to effectively prioritse and manage time to meet deadlines
Excellent knowledge of core networking concepts, network management and troubleshooting.
